briefdescription.para: Count the number of joysticks connected.

simplesect.para: The number of joystick devices connected to the computer.

detaileddescription.para: This method can be used to open the game port specified by the parameter portname amd also allows you to specify whether to use enhanced mode or not. The port name can be either an absolute path to the game port device, or only the device file name.

Enhanced mode adds support for more than 32 buttons per joystick, and an unlimited number of axes and thumb controls. To support this, several functions allow to get information about the device, such as the button count, the name of each button, and the number and name of the axis.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the game port to be opened.
Specifies whether to use enhanced mode while opening the port.

simplesect.para: B_NO_INIT if the object failed to initialize.
B_ERROR if the specified port cannot be open.
The file descriptor for the port if it is opened succesfully.
